title: ingu nI
sahitya:
ingu nI vArAyO kaNNA en kali tIrAyO enru menikkiniyAi


anupallavi

  tangum pun muruval tingaL ila mukhattil pankaja malar vizhi pongum aruL tigazha


caraNam    shentAL malar tazhuvum shen shilambu konjik-kaNNan vandAn vandAn enru kaTTiyamum kUrivara
Enrum uDan kUDi varum bAlar pugazh pEshivara kanrugaL tuLLi vAlAl cAmarangal vIshi vara
 onri unran adaratturai oppuyarvil kuzhalishaiyai tenraladu Endivara tirumayilgaL Adi vara
 kunranaiya tOl puraLum tuLabamaNanm kamazhndu vara anrilena vADum enakkezhil mEni kATSi tara
